synopsis:
Solar calendar year 2020: grotesque organisms called Others have begun eating people. To take down this new enemy, the Other Suppression Force is formed. Saved by this elite team as a child, psychokinetic Yuito withstands the training to enlist. On the other hand, prodigy Kasane was scouted for her abilities. But Kasaneâ€™s dreams tell her strange things, dragging the two into an unavoidable fate.

(Source: Funimation)
